Roomie ... Set Roommate Preferences Major|Minor Edit your profile for other\'s to view! We highly encourage inputting as much information as possible as this allows for more precise matches. Any information you enter may be used in our matching algorithm and may be shown to the public in your profile. If you wish for anything to not be disclosed, please leave the question unanswered.
Write a biography for others to get to know you! profileImage Name and (Pronouns) Select your preferred choice of dorms. Write a biography for matches to read! This may include hobbies, self descriptions, or anything you may want to attract Roommates. profileImageInput purplebacking purpleSpacerOne Settings backing Reset Profile Reset Roommate Preferences Delete Account setting Roommate Preferences roommateDisclaimer Save Preferences University of Wisconsin - Eau Claire divider1 divider2 Save Profile navBarBacking P M S Log In Password Sign Up Forgot Password?
